articles.content: Tata has added XM+ variant to Altroz' range at 6.6 lakh (ex-showroom, Delhi). This new variant is available with a petrol powertrain only and gets provisions like a seven-inch touchscreen system with… [+1640 chars]

articles.title: Sovereign gold bonds open for subscription next week ahead of Dhanteras - Mint
articles.description: Gold bonds have a maturity period of eight years with an exit option after fifth year.The redemption price is based on the then prevailing price of gold.
